DOC.brief_summary: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Performance of Magna Ease Heart Valve in Chinese patients.
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Study to Evaluate the Performance of Magna Ease Heart Valve in Chinese Patients
DOC.criteria: The patients who implanted with Magna Ease Heart Valve (Type:7300TFX and 3300TFX) in Fuwai Hospital in China. The patients agree to sign the inform consent form (ICF). No specific exclusion criteria.
